globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
The cold stings as you approach Sorin's base. A growling hum fills the air as the base's guards file into position, training their blasters on you.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.theText: Up ahead, the Empire has erected a barricade to block the way.

entityProperties.name: Barricade 1
entityProperties.theText:
A sturdy fence is blocking the way to Sorin's facility.

{-} The neutral mission tokens form a barricade. The barricade is blocking terrain.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack the barricade (Health: *2*, Defense: None). A hero can interact with the barricade ({K}) to try and discard all of its tokens.

entityProperties.name: Barricade 2
entityProperties.theText:
A sturdy fence is blocking the way to Sorin's facility.

{-} The neutral mission tokens form a barricade. The barricade is blocking terrain.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack the barricade (Health: *2*, Defense: None). A hero can interact with the barricade ({K}) to try and discard all of its tokens.

entityProperties.name: Barricade 3
entityProperties.theText:
A sturdy fence is blocking the way to Sorin's facility.

{-} The neutral mission tokens form a barricade. The barricade is blocking terrain.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack the barricade (Health: *2*, Defense: None). A hero can interact with the barricade ({K}) to try and discard all of its tokens.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The neutral mission tokens form a barricade. The barricade is blocking terrain.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack the barricade (Health: *2*, Defense: None). A hero can interact with the barricade ({K}) to try and discard all of its tokens.

You grab your weapons and brave the snow to make your way up the mountain.

{-} The mission will progress when the Rebels reach the facility.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

{-} The neutral mission tokens form a barricade. The barricade is blocking terrain.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack the barricade (Health: *2*, Defense: None). A hero can interact with the barricade ({K}) to try and discard all of its tokens.
{-} The mission will progress when the Rebels reach the facility.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
A well-placed attack triggers a chain reaction in the massive war machine. You duck for cover as it explodes. Sorin flees, cursing you and his "incompetent underlings."

Left alone in the suddenly silent base, you trigger a self-destruct sequence, leaving it a smoldering ruin.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
The colossal AT-ST lumbers toward you, its armor impervious to your attacks. As you are forced to flee the battle, you hear Sorin behind you laughing and mocking your cowardice.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The Empire receives <color="red">General Sorin</color> (Vicious Tactician) as a villain.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Discard Barricade
globalEvents.eventText: The fence collapses into a pile of rubble and twisted metal.

entityProperties.name: Barricade 1
entityProperties.theText:
A sturdy fence is blocking the way to Sorin's facility.

{-} The neutral mission tokens form a barricade. The barricade is blocking terrain.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack the barricade (Health: *2*, Defense: None). A hero can interact with the barricade ({K}) to try and discard all of its tokens.

entityProperties.theText:

{-} The neutral mission tokens form a barricade. The barricade is blocking terrain.

entityProperties.name: Barricade 3
entityProperties.theText:
A sturdy fence is blocking the way to Sorin's facility.

{-} The neutral mission tokens form a barricade. The barricade is blocking terrain.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack the barricade (Health: *2*, Defense: None). A hero can interact with the barricade ({K}) to try and discard all of its tokens.

eventActions.theText:
You start to tear the barricade down.

{-} Test {K}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the barricade, then discard all strain tokens on the barricade. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but the barricade holds. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the barricade for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Security Measures
globalEvents.eventText: The energy field collapses, and more soldiers rush in to meet you.

entityProperties.name: Energy Field 1
entityProperties.theText:
A humming energy field is blocking entrance to Sorin's facility.

{-} The Imperial mission tokens represent an energy field. Rebel figures treat the energy field as blocking terrain. Imperial figures treat the energy field as normal terrain.
{-} Rebel figure can interact with the energy field {J} or {I}) to try and deactivate it.

entityProperties.name: Energy Field 2
entityProperties.theText:
A humming energy field is blocking entrance to Sorin's facility.

{-} The Imperial mission tokens represent an energy field. Rebel figures treat the energy field as blocking terrain. Imperial figures treat the energy field as normal terrain.
{-} Rebel figure can interact with the energy field {J} or {I}) to try and deactivate it.

eventActions.theText:
{-} While <color="red">General Sorin</color> is defending, if he is adjacent to a friendly figure, add 1 white die to his defense pool.
{-} The Rebels win when the <color="red">AT-ST</color> is destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

You start to slice into the system.

{-} Test {J} or {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the energy field, then discard all strain tokens on the energy field. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

globalEvents.name: Reveal S2
globalEvents.eventText: The flurry of snow clears, and you can finally see that a winding mountain path leads up to Sorin's facility.

eventActions.theText: A shimmering energy field is blocking access to the hangar.

entityProperties.name: Energy Field 1
entityProperties.theText:
A humming energy field is blocking entrance to Sorin's facility.

{-} The Imperial mission tokens represent an energy field. Rebel figures treat the energy field as blocking terrain. Imperial figures treat the energy field as normal terrain.
{-} Rebel figure can interact with the energy field {J} or {I}) to try and deactivate it.

entityProperties.theText:

eventActions.theText:
{-} The Imperial mission tokens represent an energy field. Rebel figures treat the energy field as blocking terrain. Imperial figures treat the energy field as normal terrain.
{-} Rebel figure can interact with the energy field {J} or {I}) to try and deactivate it.
Inside the facility, an armored AT-ST is standing in the hangar. Without a pilot, it is just standing there, motionless.

entityProperties.name: AT-ST
entityProperties.theText: Deploy the <color="red">AT-ST</color> here.

enemyGroupData.customText: {-} The <color="red">AT-ST</color> does not move beyond the Energy Field as long as it is active.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Deploy the <color="red">AT-ST</color> to the red highlighted spaces.
{-} The <color="red">AT-ST</color> is inactive.
{-} The Rebels win when the <color="red">AT-ST</color> is destroyed.

{-} The neutral mission tokens form a barricade. The barricade is blocking terrain.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack the barricade (Health: *2*, Defense: None). A hero can interact with the barricade ({K}) to try and discard all of its tokens.
{-} The Imperial mission tokens represent an energy field. Rebel figures treat the energy field as blocking terrain. Imperial figures treat the energy field as normal terrain.
{-} Rebel figure can interact with the energy field {J} or {I}) to try and deactivate it.
{-} The Rebels win when the <color="red">AT-ST</color> is destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Showdown
globalEvents.eventText: Behind the barricade waits none other than General Sorin himself. "Kill them!" he shrieks, ducking for cover.

eventActions.theText: Block access to the energy field.
{-} While <color="red">General Sorin</color> is defending, if he is adjacent to a friendly figure, add 1 white die to his defense pool.

{-} The Imperial mission tokens represent an energy field. Rebel figures treat the energy field as blocking terrain. Imperial figures treat the energy field as normal terrain.
{-} Rebel figure can interact with the energy field {J} or {I}) to try and deactivate it.
{-} While <color="red">General Sorin</color> is defending, if he is adjacent to a friendly figure, add 1 white die to his defense pool.
{-} The Rebels win when the <color="red">AT-ST</color> is destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: The AT-ST
globalEvents.eventText:
A pilot rushes into the hangar and quickly climbs into the AT-ST. Immediately, the walker's guns swivel toward you.

{-} The <color="red">AT-ST</color> is no longer inactive.

eventActions.theText: Is a rebel within 6 spaces and line of sight of the <color="red">AT-ST</color>?

globalEvents.name: AT-ST Yes
globalEvents.eventText:
The AT-ST fires a blast in your direction.

{-} The <color="red">AT-ST</color> moves 1 to attack the closest Rebel figure within line of sight.

globalEvents.name: Start of Round 6
globalEvents.eventText:
More alarms blare through Sorin's facility.

{-} {D} will increase at the start of each Status Phase.
